svg.title: PV Array Mismatch Cases
svg.desc: Demonstrates current limiting by lowest current string and bypass diodes preserving output under partial shading.
svg.text: Case A: Equal strings → current sum, full voltage
I_total = I1 + I2, V ≈ N · V_module
Case B: One string shaded → current limited by lowest I
I_total ≈ min(I1, I2) + others; bypasses prevent hot‑spots
Use more parallel strings or MPPT per string to reduce mismatch losses
